Comments_List: I developed my improvisational skills and overall musicality.

generally good course; wish we had more playing time 
and time to jam

The course gave me great things to practice among the limited options for jazz at Yale.  Unfortunately, as there is only the 1 jazz improv course, the more experienced jazz players and novices learn together and it is tough for the instructor to teach to all levels.
